H0.text: What name is given to the bridge design, such as Tower Bridge, with a divided lifting roadway. Liftbridge

H1.text: What name is given to the bridge design, such as Tower Bridge, with a divided lifting roadway. Folding Bridge

H2.text: What name is given to the bridge design, such as Tower Bridge, with a divided lifting roadway. Splitbridge

H3.text: What name is given to the bridge design, such as Tower Bridge, with a divided lifting roadway. Bascule

A4.text: Tower Bridge is a bascule bridge.

A5.text: The central span of Tower Bridge is a bascule bridge that can open to allow shipping.
